alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 12:03PM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and some mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 19 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami, East Polk, North Clearwater and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread falling and blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami
